thread.section_title: Hotel Trevi - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Rome, Italy) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Quirky
thread.title_full: Quirky - Review of Hotel Trevi, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: Gail B
title: Quirky
text:
We arrived early expecting to leave our cases in the luggage room , but a nice surprise our room was ready for us which was a good start. The lady on reception on arrival was very helpful giving us a map of Rome and pointing out places to visit.we was shown to our room in a separate building, which was more than good enough for a short stay . We loved the quirkyness of the old buildings.
Breakfast was enough to set you up for a busy day ahead,although the room it was in was very small and we struggled to get a clean table.
Location was perfect for seeing the sights.
The only negative we had was the man on reception when we checked out was one of the rudest people ever.Which is a shame as we was happy with everything else.
